twoSetSkill.name: Conservation of Charge 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Boosts Total DMG by 15.0%. Combo or Charged ATK further boosts Total DMG by 15% for 15s. Can be refreshed.

threeSetSkill.name: EM Induction 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Host has 10.0% bonus Attack Speed and takes 15.0% less Elemental DMG.
